notes.text: FilterBar/SmartFilterBar: The reset button in AdaptFiltersDialog disabled logic enhanced
SmartForm/GroupElement: combined fields rename uses basic rename
SmartFilterBar: pasting single now behaves correctly
SmartLink: 'No content' text is no longer shown as heading
FilterController: Selection from ValueHelp in single fields now works correctly
SmartField is in the correct mode when used in SmartTable
ValueHelpDialog: Screen reader support for the Remove button is now enhanced
ValueHelpDialog: checking for selection indices is now correct in case of UI5 2.0
ColumnsController now works with the index from the table event
Personalization/ColumnsController: column freeze is correctly preserved when comes from variant
SmartField: Improvement of UoM format handling
comp.FilterBar: CustomData is now parsed correctly
SmartFilterBar: validation for input is now correct and the value state is not overriden when not necessary
ValueHelpDialog: Add Condition button now has correct text and ScreenReader announcement
SmartChart: IllustratedMessage Chart Type button is no longer visible when no chart types are available
SmartField: Description not updated while field is hidden
